title: Psychological Factors Influencing Appropriate Reliance on AI-enabled Clinical Decision Support Systems: Experimental Web-Based Study Among Dermatologists
details: A Küper, GC Lodde, E Livingstone, D Schadendorf… - Journal of Medical Internet …, 2025
abstract: Background Artificial intelligence (AI)–enabled decision support systems are critical tools in medical practice; however, their reliability is not absolute, necessitating human oversight for final decision-making. Human reliance on such systems can …
